mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUIS_HIRE_ENROLL(HIRE_NO_SEQ, MEMBER_NO_SEQ, HIRE_RECRUIT_NAME, HIRE_COMPANY_TITLE, HIRE_CAREER, HIRE_TASK, HIRE_DEPART, HIRE_POSITION, HIRE_PREFER, HIRE_PREFER_CONTENT, HIRE_EDU, HIRE_GENDER, HIRE_SALARY, HIRE_AGE, HIRE_SECTOR, HIRE_ADDR, HIRE_LATITUDE, HIRE_LONGITUDE, HIRE_WORKDAY, HIRE_WORKTIME, HIRE_STARTDAY, HIRE_ENDDAY, HIRE_MODE, HIRE_MANAGER_NAME, HIRE_MANAGER_TEL, HIRE_MANAGER_EMAIL, HIRE_ENT_TEL) SELECT HIRESEQ.NEXTVAL,#{member_no_seq},#{hire_recruit_name}, COMPANY_TITLE, #{hire_career},#{hire_task},#{hire_depart}, #{hire_position},null,#{hire_prefer_content},#{hire_edu},#{hire_gender},#{hire_salary},#{hire_age}, #{hire_sector},#{hire_addr},null,null,#{hire_workday},#{hire_worktime},SYSDATE,#{hire_endday}, #{hire_mode},#{hire_manager_name},#{hire_manager_tel},#{hire_manager_email},#{hire_ent_tel} FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE MEMBER_NO_SEQ = #{member_no_seq}
